title: Skin Vanished
body: i had championship kalista and its gone ?????

replies.body:
How did you acquire the skin? i.e did you rent/upgrade it from hextech, did you get a code for it, was it gifted or did you just straight purchase it with RP?

Do you have any refund credits left and have any of them been used?

Does anything relevant show up in your purchase history in the store?
purchased with rp   im actually not 100% sure i had it but i really strongly thought i had it
Well if you bought it with RP it should show up in your purchase history in the store. If it doesn't then maybe the history will show something else you bought instead?
nah the history doesnt go back that far
Well then your best bet is to [submit a support ticket](http://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can help you find out if you ended up buying it or not.
